# Saint Joseph Warriors FC

Saint Joseph Warriors Football Club is based in New Kru Town, Monrovia Liberia. The team was established in  1967 by Revd. Brother Joseph Merino.
Achievements
*Liberian Premier League: 3
:: 1976, 1978, 1979
*Liberian Cup: 2
:: 1982, 2007
